meta.article_title: How to Serve to the Backhand Attacking Receiver

serve-backhand-attacking-receiver.probleme: Serving to a backhand attacking receiver
causes_communes: players thinking they are serving low but not actually getting enough spin

debutant.description: challenge the receiver with extremely low and heavy backspin serves, varying between no-spin and backspin serves

exercices_complementaires.nom: serving from the middle or forehand side of the table
exercices_complementaires.description: serve short to the forehand with a backhand sidespin type serve, then vary between serving short and long to the backhand using the same motion

metriques_progression: maximize the number of mistakes the receiver will make
